project.name: dont touch your face
project.notes: This illustrates a use of a deep learning model called PoseNet. It defines blocks for obtaining up to 17 locations on one or more people (nose, elbow, knee, etc.). This program tracks the eyes, nose, and wrists and mirrors their movements. If a hand comes close to the face a warning is issued.

block-definition.comment: Reports the distance between two pose elements if they are visible. Otherwise a big number is reported.

block.comment: If not visible then report a number larger than any true distance.

block.l: Once everything has loaded you should see your eyes, wrists, and nose moving.

block.comment: 'poses' can report poses of each person in front of the camera. We only want one.
Tell the nose, eye, and wrist sprites to move to the new pose.

block.l: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose
block.comment: Find the shortest distance from a hand.

block.var: shortest distance between a wrist and an eye or nose

block.comment: You can decide what is too close and how to react.
All is well. Remove any message being displayed.
No poses. Might be a temporary problem. Or no one is front of the camera. Or a camera isn't available.

scripts.comment: Compute the distances between each hand and the eyes and nose.

custom-block.comment: Click to open the interface panel.

block.comment: Ignore pose locations that are less than 50% confident.
Only respond when a hand is closer than this distance to a nose or eye.

custom-block.s: Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n

scripts.comment: Adjust y by a guess at the distance from the wrist to the center of the hand. Guessing that that is about the same as the distance between the eyes.

custom-block.s: Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n
Follow pose %l and adjust y by %n

scripts.comment: Adjust y by a guess at the distance from the wrist to the center of the hand. Guessing that that is about the same as the distance between the eyes.

block.comment: If nearly transparent location can't be trusted.

block-definition.s: Follow pose %'pose' and adjust y by %'adjustment'

block.comment: The fainter I look the less confident we are about the pose.

pose property %s of %txt %txt from %l using stage coordinates %b
pose property %s of %txt %txt from %l using stage coordinates %b

block.comment: Can't see both eyes so just guess how far apart they are.

block-definition.s: pose property %'property name' of %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'
block-definition.comment: This reports either the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100 or the location of a body part as two numbers. If 'stage coordinates' is true then the location matches the stage coordinates, otherwise it is between 0 and 100.

input.options: confidence it is a person confidence there is a nose location of nose confidence there is a left eye location of left eye confidence there is a right eye location of right eye confidence there is a left ear location of left ear confidence there is a right ear location of right ear confidence there is a left shoulder location of leff shoulder confidence there is a right shoulder location of right shoulder confidence there is a left elbow location of left elbow confidence there is a right elbow location of right elbow confidence there is a left wrist location of left wrist confidence there is a right wrist location of right wrist confidence there is a left hip location of left hip confidence there is a right hip location of right hip confidence there is a left knee location of left knee confidence there is a right knee location of right knee confidence there is a left ankle location of left ankle confidence there is a right ankle location of right ankle

custom-block.s: extract pose property %n from %l using stage coordinates %b

block-definition.s: pose property %'location or confidence' of %'left or right' %'body part' from %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'
block-definition.comment: This reports either the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100 or the location of a body part as two numbers. If 'stage coordinates' is true then the location matches the stage coordinates, otherwise it is between 0 and 100.

input.options: eye ear shoulder elbow wrist hip knee ankle nose person

pose property %txt of %l using stage coordinates %b

block.comment: Only the nose has no left or right versions.
Property numbers range from 0 to 34 to identify different information in a pose.

custom-block.s: extract pose property %n from %l using stage coordinates %b

block-definition.s: extract pose property %'property number' from %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'

block.comment: Confidence that there is a person at all.
Location extracted from [["x" 1] ["y" 2]]. Coordinates adjusted to go from minimum and maximum stage x and y.
Location extracted from [["x" 1] ["y" 2]]. Coordinates adjusted to go from 0 to 100.

block-definition.comment: Reports a list of poses. Use 'pose property' to get the locations of body parts and the confidences that the locations are correct.

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l

input.options: Project notes Project name User Presentation mode Language Zoom blocks Stage size Stage scale Retina display support Long form input dialog Plain prototype labels Input sliders Execute on slider change Clicking sound Turbo mode Flat design Keyboard editing Visible stepping Thread safe scripts Prefer smooth animations Flat line ends Codification support Inheritance support Visible palette

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), ide = stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph), world = stage.parentThatIsA(WorldMorph); switch (which) { case 'Project notes': return ide.projectNotes; case 'Project name': return ide.projectName; case 'User': return ide.cloud.username; case 'Presentation mode': return ide.isAppMode; case 'Language': return SnapTranslator.language; case 'Zoom blocks': return SyntaxElementMorph.prototype.scale; case 'Stage size': return new List([StageMorph.prototype.dimensions.x, StageMorph.prototype.dimensions.y]); case 'Stage scale': return stage.scale; case 'Retina display support': return isRetinaEnabled(); case 'Long form input dialog': return InputSlotDialogMorph.prototype.isLaunchingExpanded; case 'Plain prototype labels': return BlockLabelPlaceHolderMorph.prototype.plainLabel; case 'Input sliders': return MorphicPreferences.useSliderForInput; case 'Execute on slider change': return ArgMorph.prototype.executeOnSliderEdit; case 'Clicking sound': return !!BlockMorph.prototype.snapSound; case 'Turbo mode': return stage.isFastTracked; case 'Flat design': return MorphicPreferences.isFlat; case 'Keyboard editing': return world.keyboardReceiver instanceof ScriptFocusMorph; case 'Visible stepping': return Process.prototype.enableSingleStepping; case 'Thread safe scripts': return stage.isThreadSafe; case 'Prefer smooth animations': return StageMorph.prototype.frameRate > 0; case 'Flat line ends': return SpriteMorph.prototype.useFlatLineEnds; case 'Codification support': return StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping; case 'Inheritance support': return StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance; default: return which; case 'Visible palette': return ide.currentCategory; }

block-definition.s: segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options' $nl process response %'process segmentations and poses' $nl and if there is an error %'process error'
segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options'

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l %br process response %cmdRing %br and if there is an error %cmdRing

block-definition.comment: Open an interface page for different machine learning models.

block-definition.s: Setup camera %'width' %'height' then when ready %'do when camera is ready'
block-definition.comment: Specifies the resolution of the image sent for recogntion.
Returns only after eCraft2Learn library is loaded
Should only be called by Load eCraft2Learn library

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return true; } if (window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library) { return false; } window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library = true; let script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; if (window.location.hostname === 'localhost') { script.src = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "/ai/ecraft2learn-beta.js"; // notice this the beta version } else { script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; } document.head.appendChild(script); return false;

if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } if (!no_warning) { alert("Any eCraft2Learn command must be run before the " + function_name + " reporter."); } return 0;

custom-block.comment: Check if already ready to avoid the 1 second wait

block.comment: Wait a bit more because otherwise a black image is captured.

block-definition.comment: Reports a costume using the camera.

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } else { var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.addEventListener('error', function () { alert("Unable to load https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js. Check your network connection."); }); script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; script.addEventListener('load', function () { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); }); document.head.appendChild(script); }

block-definition.comment: Reports the value of the 'key' in a table that is a list of pairs of keys and values.

block.l: return [ "confidence it is a person", "confidence there is a nose", "location of nose", "confidence there is a left eye", "location of left eye", "confidence there is a right eye", "location of right eye", "confidence there is a left ear", "location of left ear", "confidence there is a right ear", "location of right ear", "confidence there is a left shoulder", "location of leff shoulder", "confidence there is a right shoulder", "location of right shoulder", "confidence there is a left elbow", "location of left elbow", "confidence there is a right elbow", "location of right elbow", "confidence there is a left wrist", "location of left wrist", "confidence there is a right wrist", "location of right wrist", "confidence there is a left hip", "location of left hip", "confidence there is a right hip", "location of right hip", "confidence there is a left knee", "location of left knee", "confidence there is a right knee", "location of right knee", "confidence there is a left ankle", "location of left ankle", "confidence there is a right ankle", "location of right ankle" ].indexOf(property_name)
